column1: # price per x period i.e. $2 per 3 days
# Limited one-time fee i.e. $30 for 2 months

column2:
2Checkout Account Configuration:
1) If you haven't already, you will need to establish a 2Checkout account.
2) Create a new username, checking both the API Access and API Updating checkboxes. Insert the newly created username and password into this form below.
Note: If you change the secret word in your 2Checkout account, you will need to visit this page again and re-save the settings.
3) Enable Instant Notification Settings (INS). Paste the following URL into the Global Settings > Global URL box, then click Apply and Enable All Notifications, then Save Settings:
%3$s
4) Update the Site Management page, selecting the "Header Redirect" option, and pasting the following into the "Approved URL" field:
%5$s

Paypal Account Configuration:
1) If you haven't already, you will need to establish a Paypal account.
2) Enable API access on your Paypal account via: My Account > Profile > API Access > Request API credentials > Request API Signature.
3) Insert the Paypal API username, password, and signature values into this form.
4) Enable Instant Payment Notifications via: My Account > Profile > Instant Payment Notification Preferences > Choose IPN Settings. The IPN messages should be enabled, and the Notification URL should be set to:
%3$s
This gateway is only for testing the payment functions and should not be enabled for normal site operation.

Browse transactions. The search
box will look through the member name, username, email, transaction ID, and
order ID.

column1: Yes, members may select this plan.
column2: Yes, members may select this plan.

column1: No, members may not select this plan.
column2: No, members may not select this plan.

column1: Yes, show this plan on signup.
column2: Yes, show this plan on signup.

column1: No, only show this plan after signup.
column2: No, only show this plan after signup.

column1: The member will be placed into this level upon subscribing to this plan. If left empty, the default level at the time a subscription is chosen will be used.
column2: The member will be placed into this level upon subscribing to this plan. If left empty, the default level at the time a subscription is chosen will be used.

column1: The amount to charge the member. This will be charged once for one-time plans, and each billing cycle for recurring plans. Setting this to zero will make this a free plan.
column2: The amount to charge the member. This will be charged once for one-time plans, and each billing cycle for recurring plans. Setting this to zero will make this a free plan.

column1: How often should members in this plan be billed?
column2: How often should members in this plan be billed?

column1: When should this plan expire? For one-time plans, the plan will expire after the period of time set here. For recurring plans, the user will be billed at the above billing cycle for the period of time specified here.
column2: When should this plan expire? For one-time plans, the plan will expire after the period of time set here. For recurring plans, the user will be billed at the above billing cycle for the period of time specified here.

column1: Please note that payment parameters (Price, Recurrence, Duration, Trial Duration) cannot be edited after creation. If you wish to change these, you will have to create a new plan and disable the current one.
column2: Please note that payment parameters (Price, Recurrence, Duration, Trial Duration) cannot be edited after creation. If you wish to change these, you will have to create a new plan and disable the current one.

column1: Can members choose this plan? Please note that disabling this plan will grandfather in existing plan members until they pick a new plan.
column2: Can members choose this plan? Please note that disabling this plan will grandfather in existing plan members until they pick a new plan.

column1: Can members choose this plan on signup?
column2: Can members choose this plan on signup?

Browse and manage
subscriptions. The search box will look through member name, username, and
email.
This is the email that gets sent to a member when their subscription is activated.

[header]

Thank you for subscribing to our social network! Your subscription is now active.

[subscription_title]
[subscription_description]
[subscription_terms]

You may follow the link below to sign in.

[object_link]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to a member when their subscription is cancelled.

[header]

Your subscription has been cancelled.

[subscription_title]
[subscription_description]
[subscription_terms]

Please follow the link below to renew your subscription.

[object_link]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to a member when their subscription expires.

[header]

Your subscription has expired.

[subscription_title]
[subscription_description]
[subscription_terms]

Please follow the link below to renew your subscription.

[object_link]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to a member when their subscription is overdue.

[header]

Your subscription is overdue because of a failed or missed payment.

[subscription_title]
[subscription_description]
[subscription_terms]

Please follow the link below to renew your subscription.

[object_link]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to a member when their subscription is pending.

[header]

Thank you for subscribing to our social network! Your subscription is
pending, awaiting completion of the transaction. Your membership will be
activated soon; we will notify you by email when it is ready.
Thank you for your patience.

[subscription_title]
[subscription_description]
[subscription_terms]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to a member when they are billed for a recurring payment.

[header]

Your subscription has been billed. You should receive an email from the
payment gateway regarding this charge. Thank you for subscribing to our social
network.

[subscription_title]
[subscription_description]
[subscription_terms]

You may follow the link below to sign in.

[object_link]

[footer]
This is the email that gets sent to a member when their subscription is refunded.

[header]

Your subscription has been refunded and is no longer active.

[subscription_title]
[subscription_description]
[subscription_terms]

You may follow the link below to sign in.

[object_link]

[footer]
